entry.title: Monday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this evening. Snow beginning late this evening. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late in the morning and in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 60%
